snippet.title: Hell is Us | Extended Gameplay
snippet.description:
Explore more about Hell Is Us in this extended gameplay session featuring Jonathan Jacques-Belletete, Creative Director and Art Director at Rogue Factor. Hell is Us is an action-adventure game set in a war-torn country, where players must unravel the mysteries of their past and confront the human darkness that fuels the chaos. 

Whishlist now: 
Steam:https://store.steampowered.com/app/1620730/Hell_is_Us/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10005051
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/hell-is-us/9n9097g0xzmb

For news about the game, you can also follow us on: 

Twitter ► https://twitter.com/hellisusgame  
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/hellisusgame  
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/hellisusgame
